about_the_game:
Ever wanted to live out the American dream of having an abysmal 9-5 with rude management and 0 upward mobility? no?  well too bad, i made a game about it anyway.

Play as a down-on-your-luck Collage student, who just scored a gig to help pay for ramen (or whatever cheap dorm food that strikes your fancy). You are now a proud employee of Sell-By Grocers! Welcome to the team. Well... I say "team", but in reality, its just you, and your manager, Biff. Stay safe out there!

a fully first person game, where you stock shelves, deal with customers, and do your best to keep the anger meter down. multiplayer co-op coming soon.

name: Shift Happens

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 11 Home
  • Processor: 13th Gen Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-13700HX 2.10 GHz
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM

dejus.descriptors:
Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos
Violência fantasiosa
